resources.string: Please grant permission to use the application. Restart the app or give them manually from device settings.
The file\'s name is not accessible
No Internet Connection. To work properly the app needs Internet
Would you like to edit the group\'s name? This action will reassign the contacts to the newly named group while preserving their assigned ringtones.
Do you wish to delete this group? Doing so will unassigned contacts from the group, yet their assigned ringtones will remain unchanged.

Would you like to add or remove contacts to this group? By doing so, the contacts will be assigned/unassigned to the group. Changing the ringtone change will take effect once the process is completed!

For the best performance:
- Ensure all necessary permissions are granted.
- Log in with your Google account.
- Avoid adding a contact to multiple groups.
- Once you add ringtones, press the Apply Ringtones button to complete the process.
There are no contacts in the group
Pick up account where the group will be created
If you proceed, all custom ringtones set for your contacts will be removed. This means your contacts will revert to the default ringtone, and no individual ringtone settings will remain
